name: Freelancer Share Icons
author: Gaurav Daxini

sections.description:
Freelancer share icons adds very attractive responsive Freelancing share buttons of Upwork,Freelancer,Peopleperhour,Golance,Fivver,Truelancer,Guru profiles to wordpress website anywhere. This is very lightweight and simple freelancing profile sharing plugin.these freelancer share icons provide to share your all freelancing account by providing links on backend.this is first realse for beta version.

Plugin Features

  • Freelancer sharing icons support for Upwork, Freelancer, Peopleperhour, Golance, Fivver, Truelancer, Guru.
  • 100% responsive.
  • Provide Shortcode, can integrated with any theme easily.

Plugin Shortcode
You can also use following shortcode

[freelancer_share_icons]

Support

  • Fill up this form to leave comments,ask question,suggest new feature or directly mail at gauravdaxini@yahoo.com
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Freelancer Share Icons and click “Install now”
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of freelacer-sharing-icons.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/. Activate the plugin.
sections.changelog:

  • Bug fixes

1.0.1 – May 09, 2021

  • Tested with latest version of wordpress 5.7.1

1.0 – May 16, 2019

  • First release.
